title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
o Camp to speak to Scratch. You'll need Speak with Animals.

Rivington - Out in the yard of the Sword Coast Couriers, the 'post office' of the village.

Talk to Minsc after getting him as companion and after

Tell him "There is some good in all.." And when talking about the blunt blade, say it's "barbaric"

After "Guild matters till the end"
